Student Amenities

We provide all essential items to ensure our students can focus on their education without any concerns.

Comprehensive Student Support

Our residential schools provide all necessary items to students, ensuring they have everything they need for successful learning and comfortable living.

Uniforms

Each student receives 2 sets of school uniforms annually, designed for comfort and durability. The uniforms include shirts, pants/skirts, ties, belts, and sweaters for winter.

Note: All items are provided free of cost to students as part of our commitment to ensuring equal access to quality education.

Shoes & Socks

Students are provided with 2 pairs of quality shoes and 3 pairs of socks each year. The shoes are designed for comfort during long school hours and various activities.

Note: All items are provided free of cost to students as part of our commitment to ensuring equal access to quality education.

Books & Stationery

Complete set of textbooks, notebooks, and essential stationery items including pens, pencils, erasers, rulers, and geometry boxes are provided to all students.

Note: All items are provided free of cost to students as part of our commitment to ensuring equal access to quality education.

School Bags

Durable and ergonomically designed school bags are provided to all students, with compartments for books, water bottles, and other essentials.

Note: All items are provided free of cost to students as part of our commitment to ensuring equal access to quality education.

Toiletries

Basic toiletries including soap, shampoo, toothpaste, toothbrush, washing soap, and other personal hygiene items are regularly provided to residential students.

Note: All items are provided free of cost to students as part of our commitment to ensuring equal access to quality education.

Distribution Schedule

Items are distributed to students according to a planned schedule throughout the academic year.

ItemDistribution TimeQuantityReplacement Policy
UniformsBeginning of academic year (June)2 sets per studentDamaged uniforms replaced on case-by-case basis
Shoes & SocksBeginning of academic year (June)2 pairs of shoes, 3 pairs of socksReplaced if damaged before expected wear period
Books & StationeryBeginning of each termComplete set as per curriculumAdditional stationery provided as needed
School BagsBeginning of academic year (June)1 bag per studentReplaced every two years or if damaged
ToiletriesMonthly distributionMonthly supply as per requirementAdditional items provided as needed

Quality Assurance

All items provided to students undergo strict quality checks to ensure durability, comfort, and suitability for daily use. We partner with reputable suppliers who meet our quality standards.

Procurement Process

Transparent tendering process with quality specifications defined by expert committee

Quality Testing

Random sample testing of all items before distribution to ensure they meet quality standards

Feedback System

Regular feedback collected from students and staff to continuously improve the quality of items

Kittur Rani Chennamma

Kittur Rani Chennamma Residential School, Balepura, Devanahalli - Providing quality residential education for rural students.
